   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_call_time_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: 
   36: -export([seq/3, seq_r/3]).
   37: -export([loaded/1, a_function/1, a_called_function/1, dec/1, nif_dec/1, dead_tracer/1,
   38:         return_stop/1,catch_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: -define(US_ERROR, 10000).
   41: -define(R_ERROR, 0.8).
   42: -define(SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME, 10).
   43: 
   44: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   45: %% Result examination macros
   46: 
   47: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
   48: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   49: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
   50: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
   51: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
   52: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   53: 
   54: -ifdef(debug).
   55: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   56: -else.
   57: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: %% When run in test server.
   65: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   66: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   67: -export([basic/1, on_and_off/1, info/1,
   68:          apply_bif_bug/1, abb_worker/1,
   69:          disable_ongoing/1,
   70: 	 pause_and_restart/1, scheduling/1, called_function/1, combo/1, 
   71: 	 bif/1, nif/1]).
   72: 
   73: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   74:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
   75:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
   76:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
   77:     timer:now_diff(now(),now()),
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   81:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
   82:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
   83:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
   84:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: suite() ->
   88:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   89:      {timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
   90: 
   91: all() ->
   92:     [basic, on_and_off, info, pause_and_restart, scheduling,
   93:      disable_ongoing,
   94:      apply_bif_bug,
   95:      combo, bif, nif, called_function, dead_tracer, return_stop,
   96:      catch_crash].
   97: 
   98: %% Tests basic call time trace
   99: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  101:     M = 900,
  102:     %%
  103:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  104:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  105:     Pid = setup(),
  106:     {L,  T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  107:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  108:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  109: 
  110:     {Lr, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  111:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  112:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Pid, 1, 0, 0}], T2/M),
  113:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  114:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  115: 
  116:     %%
  117:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  118:     Pid ! quit,
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: %% Tests disable ongoing call_time traced function
  122: disable_ongoing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  124:     %%
  125:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_a, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  126:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  127:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_c, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  128:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_d, 0}, true, [call_time]),
  129: 
  130:     Pid = setup(),
  131: 
  132:     Self = self(),
  133:     Pid  ! {self(), execute, fun() -> disong_a(Self) end},
  134: 
  135:     c_ready = receive M1 -> M1 end,
  136: 
  137:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b,1}, false, [call_time]),
  138: 
  139:     Pid ! go_on,
  140: 
  141:     {Pid, answer, _} = receive M2 -> M2
  142:                        after 1000 -> timeout end,
  143: 
  144:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  145:     Pid ! quit,
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: disong_a(Pid) ->
  149:     ForceStack = id(a),
  150:     disong_b(Pid),
  151:     disong_d(),
  152:     ForceStack.
  153: 
  154: disong_b(Pid) ->
  155:     ForceStack = id(b),
  156:     disong_c(Pid),
  157:     ForceStack.
  158: 
  159: disong_c(Pid) ->
  160:     Pid ! c_ready,
  161:     receive
  162:         go_on -> ok
  163:     end.
  164: 
  165: disong_d() ->
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: id(I) ->
  169:     I.
  170: 
  171: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  172: 
  173: 
  174: %% "Tests turning trace parameters on and off
  175: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  177:     M = 100,
  178:     %%
  179:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  180:     Pid = setup(),
  181:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, seq, [1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end]}),
  182:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  183: 
  184:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  185:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  186:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  187: 
  188:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  189:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  190:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  191: 
  192:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  193:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  194:     {L, _T4} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  195:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  196:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [], none),
  197:     {Lr, T5} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  198:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T5),
  199: 
  200:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  201:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  202:     {Lr, _T6} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  203:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  204:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  205:     %%
  206:     Pid ! quit,
  207:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  208:     ok.
  209: 
  210: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  211: 
  212: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  213: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  215:     %%
  216:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,3}, true, [call_time]),
  217:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  218:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  219:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  220:     {all,[_|_]=L} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  221:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, L),
  222:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  223:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  224:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  225:     {call_time,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  226:     {all,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  227:     %%
  228:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  229:     ok.
  230: 
  231: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  232: 
  233: %% Tests pausing and restarting call time counters
  234: pause_and_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  236:     M = 100,
  237:     Pid = setup(),
  238:     %%
  239:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  240:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  241:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  242:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  243:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  244:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  245:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  246:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T2),
  247:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  248:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  249:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  250:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T3),
  251:     %%
  252:     Pid ! quit,
  253:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  254:     ok.
  255: 
  256: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  257: 
  258: %% Tests in/out scheduling of call time counters
  259: scheduling(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     P  = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  261:     M  = 1000000,
  262:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  263:     F  = 12,
  264: 
  265:     %% setup load processes
  266:     %% (single, no internal calls)
  267: 
  268:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,loaded,2}, true, [call_time]),
  269: 
  270:     Pids     = [setup() || _ <- lists:seq(1, F*Np)],
  271:     {_Ls,T1} = execute(Pids, {?MODULE,loaded,[M]}),
  272:     [Pid ! quit || Pid <- Pids],
  273: 
  274:     %% logic dictates that each process will get ~ 1/F of the schedulers time
  275: 
  276:     {call_time, CT} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,loaded,2}, call_time),
  277: 
  278:     lists:foreach(fun (Pid) ->
  279:                           ok = case check_process_time(lists:keysearch(Pid, 1, CT), M, F, T1) of
  280:                                    schedule_time_error ->
  281:                                        test_server:comment("Warning: Failed time ratio"),
  282:                                        ok;
  283:                                    Other -> Other
  284:                                end
  285:                   end, Pids),
  286:     P  = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  287:     ok.
  288: 
  289: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  290: 
  291: %% "Tests combining local call trace and meta trace with call time trace
  292: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  293:     Self = self(),
  294:     Nbc = 3,
  295:     MetaMs = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  296:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  297:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(5 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  298:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(9 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  299:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, [], [local]),
  300:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  301:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  302:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_count]),
  303:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  304: 
  305:     % bifs
  306:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, [], [local]),
  307:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  308:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  309:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_count]),
  310:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  311: 
  312:     1 = erlang:trace(Self, true, [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  313:     %%
  314:     {traced,local} =
  315:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, traced),
  316:     {match_spec,[]} =
  317:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, match_spec),
  318:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  319:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta),
  320:     {meta_match_spec,MetaMs} =
  321:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta_match_spec),
  322:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  323: 
  324:     %% check empty trace_info for ?MODULE:seq_r/3
  325:     {all,[_|_]=TraceInfo}     = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, all),
  326:     io:format("TraceInfo=~p\n",[TraceInfo]),
  327:     {value,{traced,local}}    = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo),
  328:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}   = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  329:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo),
  330:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  331:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfo),
  332:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfo),
  333:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfo),
  334: 
  335:     %% check empty trace_info for erlang:term_to_binary/1
  336:     {all, [_|_] = TraceInfoBif} = erlang:trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, all),
  337:     {value,{traced,local}}     = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  338:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}    = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  339:     {value,{meta, MetaTracer}}  = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  340:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  341:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  342:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  343:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  344: 
  345:     %%
  346:     [3,2,1] = seq_r(1, 3, fun(X) -> X+1 end),
  347:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  348:     with_bif(Nbc),
  349:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  350:     TimeB = erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond),
  351:     %%
  352: 
  353:     List = collect(100),
  354:     {MetaR, LocalR} =
  355:     lists:foldl(
  356:       fun ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == MetaTracer ->
  357:               {[X|M],L};
  358:           ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == LocalTracer ->
  359:               {M,[X|L]}
  360:       end,
  361:       {[],[]},
  362:       List),
  363:     Meta = lists:reverse(MetaR),
  364:     Local = lists:reverse(LocalR),
  365: 
  366:     [?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  367:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  368:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  369:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  370:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  371:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  372:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  373:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,3},[3,2,1]),
  374:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  375:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,3>>),
  376:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  377:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,2>>)
  378:     ] = Meta,
  379: 
  380:     [?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  381:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  382:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  383:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  384:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,combo,1}),
  385:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  386:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1}),
  387:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  388:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1})
  389:     ] = Local,
  390: 
  391:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  392:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  393:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  394:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  395:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{self(), Nbc - 1, 0, 0}], TimeB),
  396:     %%
  397:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  398:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  399:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  403: 
  404: %% Tests tracing of bifs
  405: bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  406:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  407:     M = 5000000,
  408:     %%
  409:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, binary_to_term, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  410:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  411:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_bif, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  412:     Pid = setup(),
  413:     {L, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  414: 
  415:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]}=WB = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,with_bif,1}, call_time),
  416:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000_000 + Us),
  417: 
  418:     B2T = erlang:trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, call_time),
  419:     T2B = erlang:trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, call_time),
  420:     io:format("with_bif       = ~p\n", [WB]),
  421:     io:format("binary_to_term = ~p\n", [B2T]),
  422:     io:format("term_to_binary = ~p\n", [T2B]),
  423:     Sum = us(WB) + us(B2T) + us(T2B),
  424:     io:format("Sum  = ~p us\n", [Sum]),
  425:     io:format("Tot1 = ~p us  Diff = ~p us\n", [Tot1, Tot1-Sum]),
  426:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  427:                               T1/2, B2T),
  428:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  429:                               T1/2, T2B),
  430: 
  431:     % disable term2binary
  432: 
  433:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, false, [call_time]),
  434: 
  435:     {L, _T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  436: 
  437:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M*2 - 2, 0, 0}], T1),
  438:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, false, none),
  439: 
  440:     %%
  441:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  442:     Pid ! quit,
  443:     ok.
  444: 
  445: us({call_time,[{_,_,S,Us}]}) ->
  446:     S*1000_000 + Us.
  447: 
  448: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  449: 
  450: %% Tests tracing of nifs
  451: nif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  452:     load_nif(Config),
  453:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  454:     M = 5000000,
  455:     %%
  456:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, nif_dec,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  457:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_nif, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  458:     Pid = setup(),
  459:     {_, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_nif(M) end),
  460: 
  461:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,with_nif,1}, call_time),
  462:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000000 + Us),
  463: 
  464:     % the nif is called M - 1 times, the last time the function with 'with_nif'
  465:     % returns ok and does not call the nif.
  466:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, nif_dec,  1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}], T1),
  467: 
  468:     %%
  469:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  470:     Pid ! quit,
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  474: 
  475: %% Tests combining nested function calls and that the time accumulates to the right function
  476: called_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  477:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  478:     M = 2100,
  479:     Pid = setup(),
  480:     %%
  481:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  482:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  483:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  484: 
  485:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_called_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  486:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  487:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  488:                           T1 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  489:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  490: 
  491: 
  492:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,dec,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  493:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  494:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M+M, 0, 0}],
  495:                           T1 + (M+M)*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  496:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  497:                           T2 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME ),
  498:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, dec, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  499: 
  500:     Pid ! quit,
  501:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  505: 
  506: dead_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  507:     TracedMFAs = dead_tracer_mfas(),
  508: 
  509:     Self = self(),
  510:     FirstTracer = tracer(),
  511:     StartTracing = fun() -> turn_on_tracing(Self) end,
  512:     tell_tracer(FirstTracer, StartTracing),
  513:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8] = seq(1, 8, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  514:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, FirstTracer),
  515:     FirstTracer ! quit,
  516:     receive
  517:         {'DOWN',Ref,process,FirstTracer,normal} ->
  518:             ok
  519:     end,
  520:     erlang:yield(),
  521: 
  522:     %% Collect and check that we only get call_time info for the current process.
  523:     Info1 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  524:     [] = other_than_self(Info1),
  525:     io:format("~p\n", [Info1]),
  526: 
  527:     %% Note that we have not turned off tracing for the current process,
  528:     %% but that the tracer has terminated. No more call_time information should be recorded.
  529:     [1,2,3] = seq(1, 3, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  530:     [] = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  531: 
  532:     %% When we start a second tracer process, that tracer process must
  533:     %% not inherit the tracing flags and the dead tracer (even though
  534:     %% we used set_on_spawn).
  535:     SecondTracer = tracer(),
  536:     tell_tracer(SecondTracer, StartTracing),
  537:     Seq20 = lists:seq(1, 20),
  538:     Seq20 = seq(1, 20, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  539:     Info2 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  540:     io:format("~p\n", [Info2]),
  541:     [] = other_than_self(Info2),
  542:     SecondTracer ! quit,
  543: 
  544:     ok.
  545: 
  546: other_than_self(Info) ->
  547:     [{Pid,MFA} || {MFA,[{Pid,_,_,_}]} <- Info,
  548:                   Pid =/= self()].
  549: 
  550: tell_tracer(Tracer, Fun) ->
  551:     Tracer ! {execute,self(),Fun},
  552:     receive
  553:         {Tracer,executed} ->
  554:             ok
  555:     end.
  556: 
  557: tracer() ->
  558:     spawn_link(fun Loop() ->
  559:                       receive
  560:                           quit ->
  561:                               ok;
  562:                           {execute,From,Fun} ->
  563:                               Fun(),
  564:                               From ! {self(),executed},
  565:                               Loop()
  566:                       end
  567:               end).
  568: 
  569: turn_on_tracing(Pid) ->
  570:     _ = erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call,set_on_spawn]),
  571:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  572:     _ = now(),
  573:     ok.
  574: 
  575: %% We want to trace functions local to this module as well as all BIFs, and for
  576: %% the latter we need to ensure that their modules are loaded.
  577: dead_tracer_mfas() ->
  578:     Modules = [M || {M,_F,_A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs)],
  579:     Whitelist0 = gb_sets:from_list(Modules),
  580:     Whitelist = case code:ensure_modules_loaded(Modules) of
  581:                   {error, Reasons} ->
  582:                       Blacklist = gb_sets:from_list([M || {M, _} <- Reasons]),
  583:                       gb_sets:subtract(Whitelist0, Blacklist);
  584:                   ok ->
  585:                       Whitelist0
  586:               end,
  587:     EligibleSNIFs = [MFA || {M,_F,_A}=MFA <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
  588:                             gb_sets:is_element(M, Whitelist)],
  589:     [{?MODULE,F,A} || {F,A} <- module_info(functions)] ++ EligibleSNIFs.
  590: 
  591: collect_all_info([MFA|T]) ->
  592:     CallTime = erlang:trace_info(MFA, call_time),
  593:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, restart, [call_time]),
  594:     case CallTime of
  595:         {call_time,false} ->
  596:             collect_all_info(T);
  597:         {call_time,[]} ->
  598:             collect_all_info(T);
  599:         {call_time,[_|_]=List} ->
  600:             [{MFA,List}|collect_all_info(T)]
  601:     end;
  602: collect_all_info([]) -> [].
  603: 
  604: 
  605: %% OTP-16111: Verify call_time does not increase after traced function returns.
  606: return_stop(_Config) ->
  607:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  608:     %%
  609:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  610:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  611:     Pid = setup(),
  612:     {aaa, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> aaa()  end),
  613:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  614:     io:format("T1=~p us, US1=~p us\n", [T1, US1]),
  615:     true = (US1 =< T1),
  616: 
  617:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  618: 
  619:     execute(Pid, fun() -> loaded(1000000)  end),
  620:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  621: 
  622:     {bbb,  _} = execute(Pid, fun() -> bbb()  end),
  623:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  624: 
  625:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,spinner,  1}, true, [call_time]),
  626:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,quicky,  0}, true, [call_time]),
  627:     {spinner,  T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> spinner(1000000)  end),
  628:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, SpS, SpUS}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,spinner,1}, call_time),
  629:     Spinner = SpS*1000000 + SpUS,
  630:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, Quicky}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,quicky,0}, call_time),
  631:     io:format("T2=~p us, Spinner=~p us, Quicky=~p us\n", [T2, Spinner, Quicky]),
  632: 
  633:     %% Before fix: quicky() got attributed the call_time of its caller spinner().
  634:     true = (Quicky =< Spinner),
  635:     true = (Spinner =< T2),
  636: 
  637:     %%
  638:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  639:     Pid ! quit,
  640:     ok.
  641: 
  642: 
  643: aaa() ->
  644:     aaa.
  645: bbb() ->
  646:    bbb.
  647: 
  648: spinner(N) ->
  649:     quicky(),
  650:     loaded(N),
  651:     spinner.
  652: 
  653: quicky() ->
  654:     done.
  655: 
  656: %% OTP-16994: next_catch returned a bogus stack pointer when call_time tracing
  657: %% was enabled, crashing the emulator.
  658: catch_crash(_Config) ->
  659:     Fun = id(fun() -> catch_crash_1() end),
  660: 
  661:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  662:     _ = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call]),
  663: 
  664:     Res = (catch Fun()),
  665: 
  666:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  667:     _ = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call]),
  668: 
  669:     id(Res),
  670: 
  671:     ok.
  672: 
  673: catch_crash_1() ->
  674:     error(crash).
  675: 
  676: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  677: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  678: %% Local helpers
  679: 
  680: load_nif(Config) ->
  681:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  682:     ok = erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,"trace_nif"), 0).
  683: 
  684: 
  685: %% Stack recursive seq
  686: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  687:     [Stop];
  688: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  689:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  690: 
  691: 
  692: a_function(1) -> a_called_function(1);
  693: a_function(N) when N > 1 -> a_function(a_called_function(N)).
  694: 
  695: a_called_function(N) -> dec(N).
  696: 
  697: with_bif(1) -> ok;
  698: with_bif(N) ->
  699:     with_bif(erlang:binary_to_term(erlang:term_to_binary(N)) - 1).
  700: 
  701: with_nif(0) -> error;
  702: with_nif(1) -> ok;
  703: with_nif(N) ->
  704:     with_nif(?MODULE:nif_dec(N)).
  705: 
  706: 
  707: nif_dec(_) -> 0.
  708: 
  709: dec(N) ->
  710:     loaded(10000),
  711:     N - 1.
  712: 
  713: loaded(N) -> loaded(N, 1.0).
  714: loaded(N, M) when N > 1 -> loaded(N - 1, M * 1.0001);
  715: loaded(_, M) -> M.
  716: 
  717: 
  718: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  719: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  720:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  721: 
  722: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  723:     [Stop | R];
  724: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  725:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  726: 
  727: % Check call time tracing data and print mismatches
  728: check_trace_info(Mfa, Expect, Time) ->
  729:     check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, Time, erlang:trace_info(Mfa, call_time)).
  730: 
  731: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, [{Pid, ExpectedC,_,_}] = Expect, Time, TraceInfo) ->
  732:     {call_time,[{Pid,Cnt,S,Us}]} = TraceInfo,
  733: 
  734:     {Mod, Name, Arity} = Mfa,
  735:     IsBuiltin = erlang:is_builtin(Mod, Name, Arity),
  736:     ok = if
  737:         %% Call count on BIFs may exceed number of calls as they often trap to
  738:         %% themselves.
  739:         IsBuiltin, Cnt >= ExpectedC ->
  740:             ok;
  741:         not IsBuiltin, Cnt =:= ExpectedC ->
  742:             ok;
  743:         true ->
  744:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n"
  745:                       " - got call count ~w~p",
  746:                       [Mfa, Expect, Cnt]),
  747:             count_error
  748:     end,
  749: 
  750:     true = (S >= 0),
  751:     true = (Us >= 0),
  752:     Sum = S*1000_000 + Us,
  753:     if
  754:         abs(1 - Time/Sum) < ?R_ERROR; abs(Time - Sum) < ?US_ERROR ->
  755:             ok;
  756:         true ->
  757:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p (Time ~p us)}~n - got ~w "
  758:                       "s. ~w us. = ~w us. - ~w -> delta ~w (ratio ~.2f, "
  759:                       "should be 1.0)~n",
  760:                       [Mfa, Expect, Time,
  761:                        S, Us, Sum, Time, Sum - Time, Time/Sum]),
  762:             time_error
  763:     end;
  764: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, _, TraceInfo) ->
  765:     case TraceInfo of
  766:         {call_time, Expect} ->
  767:             ok;
  768:         Other ->
  769:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n - got ~p~n", [Mfa, Expect, Other]),
  770:             result_not_expected_error
  771:     end.
  772: 
  773: 
  774: %check process time
  775: check_process_time({value,{Pid, M, S, Us}}, M, F, Time) ->
  776:     Sum = S*1000000 + Us,
  777:     if
  778:         abs(1 - (F/(Time/Sum))) < ?R_ERROR ->
  779:             ok;
  780:         true ->
  781:             io:format("- Pid ~p, Got ratio ~.2f, expected ratio ~w~n", [Pid, Time/Sum,F]),
  782:             schedule_time_error
  783:     end;
  784: check_process_time(Other, M, _, _) ->
  785:     io:format(" - Got ~p, expected count ~w~n", [Other, M]),
  786:     error.
  787: 
  788: 
  789: 
  790: %% Message relay process
  791: relay_n(0, _) ->
  792:     ok;
  793: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  794:     receive Msg ->
  795:                 Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  796:                 relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  797:     end.
  798: 
  799: 
  800: 
  801: %% Collect received messages
  802: collect(Time) ->
  803:     Ref = erlang:start_timer(Time, self(), done),
  804:     L = lists:reverse(collect([], Ref)),
  805:     ?dbgformat("Got: ~p~n",[L]),
  806:     L.
  807: 
  808: collect(A, 0) ->
  809:     receive
  810:         Mess ->
  811:             collect([Mess | A], 0)
  812:     after 0 ->
  813:               A
  814:     end;
  815: collect(A, Ref) ->
  816:     receive
  817:         {timeout, Ref, done} ->
  818:             collect(A, 0);
  819:         Mess ->
  820:             collect([Mess | A], Ref)
  821:     end.
  822: 
  823: setup() ->
  824:     setup([]).
  825: 
  826: setup(Opts) ->
  827:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun() -> loop() end,
  828:                    [link, {max_heap_size, 12000}]),
  829:     1 = erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call|Opts]),
  830:     Pid.
  831: 
  832: execute(Pids, Mfa) when is_list(Pids) ->
  833:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  834:     [P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa} || P <- Pids],
  835:     As = [receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end || P <- Pids],
  836:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  837:     {As, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)};
  838: execute(P, Mfa) ->
  839:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  840:     P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa},
  841:     A  = receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end,
  842:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  843:     {A, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)}.
  844: 
  845: 
  846: 
  847: loop() ->
  848:     receive
  849:         quit ->
  850:             ok;
  851:         {Pid, execute, Fun } when is_function(Fun) ->
  852:             %% Make sure we always run with the same amount of reductions.
  853:             erlang:yield(),
  854:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(Fun, [])},
  855:             loop();
  856:         {Pid, execute, {M, F, A}} ->
  857:             erlang:yield(),
  858:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(M, F, A)},
  859:             loop()
  860:     end.
  861: 
  862: %% OTP-17290, GH-4635
  863: apply_bif_bug(_Config) ->
  864:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, abb_worker, [self()]),
  865:     erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  866:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,abb_foo,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  867:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,display,1}, true, [call_time]),
  868:     Pid ! {call, erlang, display, ["Hej"]},
  869:     receive
  870:         done -> ok
  871:     end,
  872:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]).
  873: 
  874: abb_worker(Papa) ->
  875:     receive
  876:         {call, M, F, Args} ->
  877:             abb_foo(M, F, Args),
  878:             Papa ! done
  879:     end.
  880: 
  881: 
  882: abb_foo(M,F,Args) ->
  883:     apply(M,F,Args).
